messages.subject: Thanks
messages.msgSnippet: I ve not been on this list long.. and tend to be a lurker anyway. I want to say how thankful I am to be able to listen in .. I must admit that for the past
messages.messageBody:
I've not been on this list long.. and tend to be a 'lurker' anyway. I want
to say how thankful I am to be able to 'listen in'.. I must admit that for
the past 3 or 4 years.. I really thought we were true unschoolers..but after
the lastest discussions concerning tv and food. I realized we are not. But I
think there might still be hope for us! I may not ever be quite as 'free'
as some.. but you all are definately an inspiration and do make me think and
consider the hows and whys in my life.
It's just so funny, because in my small hm'school circle.. "I am" considered
the radical..LOL!!
Julie in MO
